LEGAL.RESPONSIBLE_TEXT: Responsible for the content according to § 55 para. 2 RStV: Ismail Baris, [Address as above]
LEGAL.LIABILITY_CONTENT_TEXT: The contents of this website have been created with the greatest care. However, I cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the content.
LEGAL.LIABILITY_LINKS_TEXT: My website contains links to external third-party websites, the content of which I have no influence over. Therefore, I cannot assume any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the linked pages is always responsible for their content.
LEGAL.COPYRIGHT_TEXT: The content and works created by me on this website are subject to German copyright law. Contributions by third parties are marked as such. The reproduction, editing, distribution, and any kind of use beyond the limits of copyright law require my written consent.

SECTION1.TITLE: 1. General information
SECTION1.TEXT: The protection of your personal data is very important to me. This website can generally be used without providing personal data. If personal data (such as name, address, or e-mail address) is collected, this is always done on a voluntary basis whenever possible.

SECTION2.TITLE: 2. Collection and use of data
SECTION2.TEXT: When you visit this website, certain data (such as browser type, operating system, referrer URL, and time of access) may be automatically stored in server log files. This data cannot be directly associated with individual persons and will not be merged with other data sources.

SECTION3.TITLE: 3. Contact
SECTION3.TEXT: If you contact me by e-mail, the data you provide will be stored for the purpose of processing your inquiry and in case of follow-up questions. This data will not be shared without your consent.

SECTION4.TITLE: 4. Cookies
SECTION4.TEXT: This website may use cookies to improve user experience. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device. You can configure your browser to refuse cookies or to notify you when cookies are used.

SECTION5.TITLE: 5. Your rights
SECTION5.TEXT: You have the right to request information about the personal data stored about you, its origin, recipients, and the purpose of storage at any time, free of charge. You also have the right to request correction, blocking, or deletion of this data.

SECTION6.TITLE: 6. Responsible party
SECTION6.TEXT: Responsible for data processing on this website: Ismail Baris, Finkenstraße 2, 52531 Übach-Palenberg, Germany, E-Mail: contact@ismail-baris.de

ABOUT.INTRO: Hi, I'm a German-speaking Software Developer based in Aachen. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.

ATTRIBUTES.LOCATION:
Based in Aachen, Germany
Rooted in the heart of Europe, I embrace an international perspective and value the blend of local culture with global opportunities in the IT field.
ATTRIBUTES.PROBLEM_SOLVING:
Passion for Creative Problem-Solving
I enjoy turning complex challenges into elegant, user-friendly solutions by combining technical expertise with a strong sense for design and usability.
ATTRIBUTES.TECH_FOUNDATION:
Strong Technical Foundation
Skilled in modern web technologies and frameworks, I continuously expand my knowledge to deliver scalable, efficient, and future-proof applications.

SKILLS.INTRO: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to continuously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
SKILLS.CONTACT_TEXT: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
SKILLS.TOOLTIP: I have a special interest in learning

PROJECTS.INTRO: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

SHINOBI.DESCRIPTION: Jump & run ninja game with fun mechanics and pixel art style.

POKEDEX.DESCRIPTION: Simple app to browse Pokémon using an API.

REFERENCES.HEADER: What my colleagues say about me

REF1.TEXT: Lukas has proven to be a reliable group partner. His technical skills and proactive approach were crucial to the success of our project.
REF1.AUTHOR: H.Janisch – Team Partner

REF2.TEXT: I had the good fortune of working with Lukas on a project at the Developer Akademie. He always stayed calm, knowledgeable, and easy to work with.
REF2.AUTHOR: T.Schulz – Frontend Developer

REF3.TEXT: Working with Lukas was inspiring. His structured way of thinking helped our team to stay focused and efficient.
REF3.AUTHOR: M.Müller – Fullstack Developer
